🔸The clues shall involve questions related to math, puzzles and aptitude questions. Work your brains to work your way out to the treasure.
🔸The clues are to be found in a particular order. A team cannot skip a clue. Skipping a clue leads to the disqualification of the team.
🔸An entire team must stay together. It cannot split up to find different clues.
🔸Replacement of any participants is not allowed after registration.
🔸All the means used by the teams should be fair, in case of any violation of the rules or any use of unfair means, teams will be disqualified from the contest ( No refunds will be given. )
🔸The Treasure Hunt consists of clues located at different places, each one leading to the next clue.

name: Strike 3 - Basketball 3's
event_content:
"𝓘𝓽 𝓭𝓸𝓮𝓼𝓷'𝓽 𝓶𝓪𝓽𝓽𝓮𝓻 𝓲𝓯 𝔂𝓸𝓾 𝓯𝓪𝓵𝓵 𝓭𝓸𝔀𝓷, 𝓲𝓽'𝓼 𝔀𝓱𝓮𝓽𝓱𝓮𝓻 𝔂𝓸𝓾 𝓰𝓮𝓽 𝓫𝓪𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹."
                                 ~𝓜𝓲𝓬𝓱𝓪𝓮𝓵 𝓙𝓸𝓻𝓭𝓪𝓷

The fun begins..... It is not always you get an opportunity to get high on the adrenaline by some high energy games.
BRAHMA'23⚡brings to you a 3s Basketball Game.
Wanna fight with fellow mates and others then seize the chance, register in the link below and be at ASIET.

⚜️ Register at: min.lc/basketball-3s
⚜️ Registration fee: 450/- per team
📅 Date: April 1,2023

𝙍𝙪𝙡𝙚𝙨 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙍𝙚𝙜𝙪𝙡𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨:
🔸️There can be multiple teams from the same college.
🔸️All team members should be from the same college.
🔸️Each team will have 5 players. 3 starters and 2 substitutes. Each team should have atleast 2 women players.
🔸️There should be a woman player from a team in the playing 3 at any point of time.
🔸️It is ideal to have a uniform for a team.
🔸️The tournament will be in a knockout format.
🔸️The time limit will be 10 minutes per match. The clock will not be stopped for out of bounds.
🔸️The points are counted in 1s and 2s. Free throws are counted as 1.
🔸️After a point is scored, the ball will be turned over to the conceding team to restart.
🔸️First team to score 21 points, or the team that leads at the end of the stipulated time, wins the match.
🔸️In the event of a tie, an overtime of 2 mins in addition to the normal time will be played. There will be a 1 minute break between normal time and overtime.
🔸️In the event of overtime also resulting in a tie, the clock will be running, and the first team to score 2 points first will win the match.
🔸️Fixture will be published after the number of participating teams are confirmed.
🔸️The referee's decision will be final.

Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity</br>to learn how the industry can prepare with IoT and explore its limitless potential</br>through an engaging workshop.</br>Join us for the IoT Workshop and emerge out as a proficient person.</br></br>Speaker: Kallu Sudarsan SS</br>                    CoFounder</br>                    Revertech IT Solutions</br></br>⚜️ Register at: min.lc/iot-workshop</br>⚜️ Registration fee: 300/- per head</br>🗓️ Date: 31 March,2023</br></br>Rules and Regulations</br>🔸Participants should be present throughout the workshop unless stated otherwise.</br>🔸Participants may bring their laptop with them. If they fail, a system will be provided by</br>the venue.</br>🔸Upon successful completion of the workshop, a certificate will be awarded to the</br>participant.</br>🔸Valid college ID card is mandatory for the participants.</br>🔸Any kind of destruction caused to the host college property mentioned by the</br>organizing team will be penalized.</br>🔸Proper discipline must be maintained.</br>🔸Fully functional IoT kits will be provided at the venue.</br></br>Don't miss out on this great opportunity!!</br></br>For more queries, contact</br>Rahul : 9072747333</br>Vishnu : 9744473420</br></br>#brahma23</br>#asiet</br>#iot_workshop

name: Arduino Workshop - IEEE
event_content: "The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice." </br> ~ Brian Herbert</br>Hola Amigos!!😃</br></br>Are you looking for an opportunity to grab new skills ?</br></br>Technology will never replace great teachers, but in the hands of great teachers, it’s transformational. </br>IEEE SB ASIET in association with BRAHMA'23⚡ proudly presents to you DIY workshop using Arduino.✨</br></br>So what are you waiting for ?</br></br>⚜️ Register at: min.lc/IEEE-Workshop</br>🗓️ Date: 30 March 2023</br>⚜️ Registration fee: </br>      📌IEEE Members: Free</br>     📌Non- IEEE Members: 150/-</br></br>Speaker: Goutham P M</br>      Chairperson of ASME, ASIET</br></br>For any queries, </br>Abhijith S : 7736169164</br>Samuel Sabu Thomas : 9656309491</br></br>#brahma23 </br>#asiet</br>#ieeesbasiet

name: Web Design & Development Workshop - IEI
speaker_content: IoT Developer, Trizwit Technologies</br>Mr. Able Varghese is a passionate engineer having 2+ years of experience in IoT and Blockchain, currently he is working as an IoT Developer at Trizwit Technologies.
event_content: “Digital design is like painting, except the paint never dries.”</br>                                 -Neville Brody</br></br>Unleash your creativity with our web development workshop! This immersive experience will guide you through the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while empowering you to design and build your own websites. </br></br>Join us at BRAHMA’23⚡ for the Web Design & Development Workshop as our expert facilitators will provide hands-on exercises, real-life examples, and interactive discussions, inspiring collaboration and innovation. </br></br>Join us and unleash your digital potential! </br></br>To join with us for the workshop we have an eloquent speaker!</br>Speaker : Abel Varghese</br>                     IoT Developer, Trizwit Technologies</br>             </br>⚜️ Register at: min.lc/IEI-Workshop</br>                              </br>⚜️ Registration fee: </br>250/- for Non IEI members </br>200/- for IEI members</br>📅 Date: April 1,2023</br></br>Rules and Regulations</br></br>🔸College ID card is mandatory.</br>🔸Participants should be present for workshop during the whole event.</br>🔸Participants may bring their laptop with them. </br>🔸Participants will be provided with all necessary materials, including computers, software, and any other resources needed for the workshop.</br>🔸Certificates will provided upon successful completion of the workshop.</br>🔸There are no pre-requisites for attending this workshop.</br>🔸All participants must follow a code of conduct that emphasizes respectful behavior towards other.</br></br>For more queries, contact</br>Devikalekshmi : 8139820669</br>Dominic : 9199947608</br></br>#brahma23</br>#asiet</br>#iei_workshop

name: 3D Printing Workshop
event_content: Always design a thing by considering it in the next larger context – a chair in a room, a room in a house, a house in an environment and an environment in a city.                                                                                            ~Eliel Saarinen </br></br>Hello Peeps🤩,</br></br>We see a lot of world around us being changed by technology and we want to be apart of it. </br>So BRAHMA'23⚡ brings you an exhilarating worshop on 3D Printing Workshop which will unlock a space where art meets technology 🧑‍💻. </br></br>Join us for a mind-blowing journey into the world of limitless creativity, where you can bring your wildest imaginations to life with our cutting-edge 3D printing worksho</br></br>Mentor: Joseph Binu</br>                  Embedded Engineer </br></br>So what are you waiting for?</br></br>Register your seats now👇</br>⚜️ Register at: min.lc/3dprinting-workshop</br>⚜️ Registration fee: 400/- per head</br>🗓️ Date: 30 March,2023</br></br>For any queries, contact</br>Vibin : 8129459255</br>Varun : 9567822308</br></br>#brahma23 </br>#asiet</br>#3Dprinting_workshop

name: CNC Workshop
event_content: “For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.”</br>― Aristotle</br></br>Technology over technique produces emotionless design.</br></br>Computer Numerical Control (CNC) is the automated control of machining tools by means of a computer.</br></br>Well,BRAHMA'23⚡ presents before you to sharpen your skills and highlight the need to achieve production resilience through a CNC Workshop.</br>Join the workshop and contribute the same for the future!!</br></br>To enlighten the audience, we will be having an expert in the field!!</br></br>Mentor: Jose V O</br>                  Retired CNC Trainer, HMT</br>               </br>⚜️ Registration link: min.lc/cncworkshop</br>⚜️ Registration fee: 400/- per head</br>📅 Date: April 1,2023</br></br>Rules and Regulations</br>🔸College ID card is mandatory.</br>🔸Report 15 mins before the commencement of the workshop.</br>🔸Bring a book and pen for the workshop.</br>🔸All materials used in the workshop are the property of the college and should not be taken out of the workshop.</br>🔸Put your phone in silent mode.</br>🔸Attendance is really important for the certificate so students should be present during the full time of workshop.</br>🔸Please inform the coordinators on your arrival.</br>🔸Time for freshing up will be provided in between the theory and practical session.</br>🔸Review all CNC set up and operating procedures provided</br></br>For further details contact,</br>Rahul : 9605057696</br>Stenin : 8304807840</br></br>#brahma23 </br>#asiet</br>#cnc_workshop
